segments.text: Who's that man over there talking to James ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's very handsome , isn't he ? What's he like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's very nice , actually , but rather eccentric .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but he may be too eccentric even for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? What do you mean by that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Heard what ? No one ever tells me anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , apparently , he's been having an affair with his secretary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: According to Mary , he's divorcing his wife and there's a big fight going on about the children . I thought everyone knew .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what can I say ? I didn't know . Oh , I meant to tell you earlier , your blouse doesn't really match your skirt . Those colors don't really suit you either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . Thanks . Look , I must just go and say hello to someone . I'll be right back .
segments.speaker: S2
